ReleaseNotes.Notes:
*Helium Rain Beta* Welcome to Helium Rain
*Changelog* This is a beta build of Helium Rain. Please do not share this software. We're trying to complete the game with your feedback before we release it officially.
We expect this release to have all features of the final game and most of the content. Have fun :)
*Bug reports* Please report any issue you have with the game on our public bug tracker : http://dev.helium-rain.com Thank you for helping us making Helium Rain a great game.
